name: Everlink
description:
Everlink is pioneering ultrasonic technology that seamlessly connects smart-devices. Our technology empowers businesses to create frictionless, contactless and efficient user-experiences with unrivaled speed and security.

Think NFC but without the functional issues . . .

jobs.title: IOS Developer
jobs.description:
Everlink is on a mission to empower businesses with frictionless smart-device connectivity technology to create user experiences that feel like magic!

We are pioneering disruptive smart-device verification technology that harnesses the power of ultrasonic - creating instant interactions in proximity. Our launch product is an integratable SDK that businesses can use to create their own frictionless customer verification experiences.

Everlink is looking to recruit their first developer in the technology team and are seeking a creative, bright and fearless person with a drive to make a serious impact on a growing business. You will be working closely with the CTO and have real responsibilities that will make a change to the world around you. 

**About the role**

We are looking for a talented developer to join our tech team - with core experience in IOS development. You’ll be a fast learner and enjoy exploring and embracing the latest cutting edge technologies.

You will play a crucial role in shaping our launch product, while continuously looking to the future to create the next generation of the Everlink technology.

This role provides an opportunity to develop your skills and define your career, so if you are looking for a chance to pioneer new technology and redefine frictionless user experiences - then look no further! 

**Key responsibilities**

* Work with our tech team to complete our launch product
* Refining our launch product into a evolved ‘plug-in and play’ product
* Assist in specific client product augmentation
* Be creative, contribute to future technologies and really push the limit of what ultrasonic can achieve!

**You will have**

* Expertise in native IOS development, testing and deployment.
* Experience building IOS SDK/Libraries/Frameworks
* Willing to both learn from and mentor others, and seek continued improvement of both self and team.
* A genuine curiosity about new technologies and exploring their practical applications.

**You may have:**

* Familiarity with signal processing
* Familiarity with server-side APIs.
* Familiarity using issue/project tracking tools and source control.


**Benefits**
* Competitive starting salary with rapid progression potential
* Equity share options
* An opportunity to quickly become a senior team member   
* A young, energetic and determined team-dynamic
* An opportunity collaboratively create the company you want to be apart of 
* Friday drinks and social activities

**Diversity promise**

We believe that a great workplace is one that represents the open-modern world. That means we have no judgement when it comes to any one of the things that make you who you are - your gender, race, sexuality, religion or your secret aversion to Game of Thrones. All you need is a passion and a desire to impact the world.
